about_the_game:
This aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 1 includes 100 new aircraft models and 20 additional sceneries.

It focusses primarily on aerobatic and high performance aircraft for the pilot training.
This is the right addition to your aerofly RC 10 if you want to become a better pilot in the next competition or if you want to want to explore new aircraft categories and have a ton of fun whilst improving your skills.

The Expansion Pack 1 adds 100 new aircraft with the primary focus on your flying skills. It offers lots of 3D and competition aerobatic aircraft, 3D helicopters, multi-copters, gyrocopters, fun-flyers and high performance gliders and aerobatic aircraft.

Choose from 20 exciting new sceneries that challenge your flying skills in new ways. This Expansion Pack 1 offers new 4D sceneries like a racecourse and aircraft carrier, multiple indoor sceneries, Las Vegas night flying scenery, several slope soaring scenes and of course popular model airfields.

INCLUDED AIRCRAFT


Aerobatic:
  • Amethyst
  • Avila
  • CAP 10
  • Curare
  • Curare Nitro
  • E-flite UMX Beast
  • EDGE 540 arTistic (4D Setup)
  • EXTRemA 330S (4D Setup)
  • Edge 540T
  • Elanor (4D Setup)
  • Extra 260
  • Extra 330 S
  • Miss Wind S Pro
  • Obsession
  • Pitts Python
  • Ultimate
  • Velox Revolution 2
  • Visa


Gliders:
  • Albatros XXL
  • Alpina 4001
  • Balmung-Mini
  • Discus 2CT
  • Dynamic 160
  • Elektro-Taser
  • Freedom Glider
  • Intention
  • Junior S
  • Merlin
  • Minimach
  • Prolution 4004
  • Pulsar 3200
  • Puri
  • Raketenwurm

  • Storm
  • Surprise 14
  • Xeno

  • TDS
  • ThreeDee MP XL-E
  • ThreeDee Rigid
  • ThunderTiger Mini Titan V2

Multicopter:
  • B car

  • Phantom 4 Pro

  • Vendetta II

More aircraft:

  • Dogfighter

  • Piper Foamie Bushwheels
  • Slofun

INCLUDED SCENERIES


Included 4D sceneries with adjustable time of day, weather conditions and aircraft on-board cameras:
  • Carrier (USA)
  • Racecourse


Included multi-panorama sceneries:
  • Aspach (Baden-W., Germany)
  • Golden Gate (California, USA)
  • Parker Mountain (California, USA)
  • Weldon (California, USA)
  • Wurmlingen (Baden-W., Germany)


Included panorama sceneries:
  • Ayers Rock (N. Territory, Australia)
  • Ayutthaya (Thailand)
  • Bendern (Liechtenstein)
  • Friedrichshafen (Baden-W., Germany)
  • Herrieden Stadel (Bavaria, Germany)
  • Hilzingen Winter (Baden-Württemberg, Germany)
  • Las Vegas (Nevada, USA)
  • Olsen Stadium (Iowa, USA)
  • The Thumb (Arizona, USA)
  • Tyson Indoor (Iowa, USA)
  • Venice R/C Fliers (Florida, USA)
  • Vohenstrauss (Bavaria, Germany)
  • Wöllaner Nock (Kärnten, Austria)

name: aerofly RC 10 - Expansion Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 1 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.
